name: WOW Star Solitaire
description:
Try this new solitaire game and win a high score!

Are you looking for a new game? Try WOW Star Solitaire! It may be the best choice for fun and relaxing. It is easy to play with boosters of many kinds and get a high score!

How To Play
It is designed based on the classic solitaire game but easier to play. Connect the card with adjacent numbers，clean all cards on the table and you win!

Powerful Boosters
There are three interesting boosters for helping win. Some levels might be hard. Open your mind and use the boosters wisely, and you may find it easy and exciting!

Game Features：
-Vertical mode
-Easy and Fun, you will pick up soon with tutorials
-Tap to move cards simply
-Useful tips

Download now and start playing this new puzzle game！
